titles.title: To prohibit any type of class III gaming on Indian lands within a State except for the type of class III gaming specifically allowed by that State.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/9/1993--Introduced. Amends the Indian Gaming Regulatory Act to prohibit any type of class III gaming on Indian lands within a State unless specifically allowed by that State.
